reviews.text: One of my favorite restaurants in the heights! Great food, great ambience, highly recommend.
Food was amazing... the atmosphere and location equally as amazing
One of my favorite restaurants in the Heights, My food, Chorizo and eggs, always on point. The hibiscus flavored mimosas was delicious.
This place still sucks. Stop changing the liquor you use on happy hour.
Food and service was outstanding
One of the best salmon I‚Äôve ever had!

We came here to celebrate my friend‚Äôs birthday and it was phenomenal! This is definitely a quality fine-dining spot. Their take on Latino and Mediterranean cuisine was so impressive ‚Äî every dish had a journey of flavors. I honestly felt like Remy in that Ratatouille scene, trying to decipher all the different notes in each bite.

The service made the experience even better. Angelica, our server, was incredibly accommodating and caring. She paid attention to every little need we had and went out of her way to make sure we felt welcome ‚Äî even when we thought we were being a bother, she reassured us we weren‚Äôt at all.

And a big shout-out to Sergio at the bar ‚Äî he crafted excellent drinks and tailored them perfectly to our preferences.

From the food to the drinks to the service, everything was top-notch. I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough for a special night out!
Great service and great place. The environment always relaxing. The brunch is amazing! The rest I leave it for you to find out.
I like the service and the food
Enjoyed celebrating a special occasion here with fun cocktails, every dish delicious, and attentive service.

I love to see such an amazingly ran and high standards spot in our community. Food and service was just amazing! Did not give it 5 stars because the music was too loud. In my humble opinion, the electronic, remix playlist that just was too much for a Tuesday meal at 5pm.
SON CARO y la comida es SALA.El lugar estan en la calle, no hay espacio para sentarse casi, mi mesa estaba al lado de un basurero
Great music, awesome food and customer service was on point. Genesy is a wonderful server to have. Always came by to take care of us, recommended best dishes. 5/5 I recommend here for a nice dinner.

I frequently eat out at least once a week and Terravita has made it to my ‚Äútop of the list‚Äù with this first time visit. The food was unique and unbelievably flavorful; the ambience is simple yet elegant and the staff was so accommodating and friendly! (can you tell I am loving Terravita?)
Great food and atmosphere. ü©µ
Amazing food and spectacular service by Genesy! I will definitely come back.
we always have a great time at Terravita! and we had a great experience today with Nick.
The food was amazing and Robert was spectacular. My husband and I will definitely return!

Absolutely delicious find. Every food item we had was so good. Filled with flavor. The Brussels sprouts were crisped perfectly too.

The staff was so nice and attentive the whole time. We lived our server Nick! Definitely try this place and get dessert! We could have had 3 more of the chocolate trees.
Great vibes. Seated 12 of us as a walk in. Music was bumping. Delicious food and Nick the waiter was the best!

The food was both beautiful to look at and incredibly tasty! There was a great blend of Asian, Italian, and American flavors. Our server Nick was very attentive and the food came out promptly. Will definitely be returning!
Go here! Often. Eat all the things! They are all amazing.
Gracias Angelica por tu buen servicio üëç
Jasmine was a fantastic server.  The food we had was truly delicious.  Very nice presentation. Drinks were tasty.  Definitely would go again.
Jasmine our server gave us an amazing experience! Great food and great service!

The food was really good and the restaurant is clean! My partner and I came here for dinner and had the lamb hummus, lobster ravioli, churrasco, and plant chocolate for desert. It was all good eats and our server, Jasmine, was such a delight. She was super attentive and sweet. One of the best servers ive had in a long time. Def recommend coming here.
Jasmine the server was the best! Extremely kind wait staff paired with well established food.
The place is comfy, modern and service was excellent.

I had a great time dining at this restaurant. The food was delicious, well-seasoned, and fresh. The service was friendly and attentive without being overwhelming. The atmosphere was relaxed and welcoming ‚Äî perfect for a casual meal or a special night out. Everything arrived on time, and the staff made sure we felt comfortable throughout. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back and recommending it to friends and family!

My sister and I haven‚Äôt been around my old neighborhood in while and randomly step inside for lunch. One look at the menu and sold. It‚Äôs was perfect very delicious food and amazing service by Robert. He was such a delight. We are definitely going back for brunch. We had the yucca fries with seasame calamari and the quinoa salad so yummy also can‚Äôt forget the flan French toast for dessert delicious.
Excellent.‚ú®Ô∏èü´õ

Our server Jasmine was beyond exceptional. Her professionalism , warm personality and overall great attitude made us want to come back just for her alone. Great food, atmosphere and service will be referred to everyone I know. Overall, 10/10 dining experience! We will make this restaurant our favorite event!
The food was great. Jasmin was amazing!
Jasmine!!!! Girly! You were amazing, thank you for the hospitality. Oh and the  food was great.

Wir haben hier sehr, sehr lecker gegessen. Auf der Karte stehen besondere Gerichte, die man nicht √ºberall findet. Die Zutaten waren toll kombiniert und geschmacklich absolut √ºberzeugend. Alles sch√∂n angerichtet, die Musik war cool, der Service sehr aufmerksam. Nur die Klimaanlage war etwas zu kalt eingestellt f√ºr meinen Geschmack ... Aber das tr√ºbt den Eindruck nicht. Wir hatten wirklich einen sch√∂nen Abend- vielen Dank, liebes Terravita-Team! Klare Empfehlung!!
Brunch so good I forgave all my enemies mid-bite. Burger cured my trust issues. Immaculate Vibes, and Pancakes Thick like my emotional baggage. Would brunch here again in a heartbeat. 10/10

It was my first time here, and I was truly impressed by the beautiful decor, delicious food, and outstanding service. A big thank you to my amazing server, Jasmine; she was incredibly sweet, friendly, and attentive. I highly recommend visiting and asking for Jasmine, you won‚Äôt regret it!

This is an absolute gem and I‚Äôm so happy to have it in my neighborhood. The decor is simply gorgeous - every little detail is just adorable. The service is always so attentive whether you sit at the bar or have a table you feel welcomed. Anaelica at the bar is amazing so attentive and kind. The staff works well together and seems to be in a harmony that brings a calm peaceful vibe. Let‚Äôs talk about the good- I haven‚Äôt had a bad meal here. What I love about it is the creativity of the dishes and the thoughtfulness that goes into the dishes. I have been here a few times and hoped to keep it my little secret but it‚Äôs too good not to share.
Amazing food, drinks, ambiance, and service.
Food was great ,our server jasmine was amazing üëè!!!

Amazing dishes. Flavorful with many choices.

Attentive staff. Clean environment. Beautiful decor.

Food & Service was Amazing.
Great Vibe here.
Luv it!!
Excelente servicio angelica
The food, service, ambience, and overall experience is high quality and delightful! Highly recommend and Jasmine, our server, was amazing and friendly!
Jasmine was my waitress, absolutely outstanding service. Drinks were fantastic and the food is amazing. Absolutely recommend.

I never write reviews so trust I mean this‚Ä¶ THIS PLACE IS SO GOOD!!! Jasmine is the best server so considerate and had great recommendations! Everything was amazing, we especially enjoyed our yucca fries and crab empanadas. One of the best dinners I‚Äôve had here.
loveeee sergio, place is super nice and always great service !
seregio is the sweetest and kindest soul. he is very attentive and fast. he makes the best drinks and deserves a raise!!

Anytime I‚Äôm in NY I always make time to go to Terravita! The food and service never disappoints. We had my cousins bday dinner there last night and our server Nick was amazing. Thank you for taking care of us!
Angie and Keily have become a part of me and my girlfriend's tradition. Spectacular service every time, and we enjoy comming in to be greeted by them.
ÏùåÏãùÏùÄ Îä¶Í≤å ÎÇòÏôîÏúºÎ©∞, Í≥†Í∏∞ÏóêÏÑúÎäî ÎÉÑÏÉàÍ∞Ä ÎÇòÍ≥†, Í≥ÑÏÇ∞ÏóêÏÑúÎäî 3.5% credit card fee Í∞Ä ÏûàÎÑ§Ïöî.

Wow‚Äîwhere do I begin? The service was incredible! I came for my friend‚Äôs birthday brunch, and we were warmly greeted by Elena, who knew the menu inside and out. She gave us great recommendations, and of course, we went with the bottomless brunch‚Äîhighly recommend. The oysters were delicious, the drinks were perfect, and Elena was an absolute gem. I loved my short rib hash, and my friend enjoyed her sandwich. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

I had such an amazing experience at Terravita, and a huge part of that was thanks to our incredible waitress, Mariana. From the moment we sat down, she made us feel completely comfortable and welcomed. She was warm, friendly, and attentive in the most genuine way ‚Äî not once did we feel rushed or overlooked.

Mariana went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed and was happy to answer all of our questions with a smile. Her positive energy truly added to our dining experience and made the evening feel extra special.

If you're dining at Terravita, I highly recommend asking for Mariana ‚Äî she's hands down one of the best servers we've ever had!

Nick was our server and took great care of us.   He gave excellent recommendations.   There was a happy hour going until 8pm.   Fun vibe.   Beautiful decor.  Seafood dishes were great.   the Lebanese lamb hummus was a winner!   Best hummus I've had in a long time!

I am beyond pleased with Terravita‚Äôs service, quality of food, the decor. It was a beautiful dinner for my graduation. Our server Nick was super attentive, and was always ensuring that we were settled and enjoying ourselves. The food was beyond my expectations! :) I had the oxtail risotto and I definitely recommend that for anyone who is in the mood for some good balanced flavors. My family ordered the gnocchi and we all shared the crab empanadas, which was also very tasty. I also would recommend their baklava and chocolate dessert! Super fun presentation and very tasty.
Great food! I love the bottomless brunch. Nick was awesome and tended to our needs. Beautiful space and it smells good. Everything was delicious!!!

Terravita is a gem in Washington heights. Once inside you kind of forget where you are. Elena was great the two times I visited this past week, friendly, great suggestions, and a great vibe. The restaurant itself has a great low-key sexy vibe and the music fits it perfectly.

Now to the food. The short rib croquettes were amazing, shrimp plantain baskets were also amazing and I almost never eat shrimp. I had oxtail risotto one night, and the whole branzino last night. Both were really good, tasty dishes. Awesome presentation but great flavors balanced pretty well. Cigar old fashion is one of the best old fashions I‚Äôve ever had around this world. Highly recommend
Excellent service & delicious food! A big thank you to Dariana for the spectacular experience. She was very knowledgable with all of the dishes, gave perfect recommendations, provided great service!

Went to a concert next door and walked in unplanned .
Was amazed by the amazing look of the restaurant and the great vibe.
We set by the bar and got service from the amazing Angela who made us amazing drinks and recommended what to eat.
Everything we ate was so good and well made ,not dishes, you get to eat at many restaurants.  We loved it and can't wait for the next concert so we can go back and visit again!

10/10 recommend! This is one of our go to places. The food was delicious & Angie was great & super nice! We order off menu drinks, Angie & the bar staff were super accommodating. The drinks were delicious

I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs better; the food or the service! The brunch menu, or dinner menu! Always torn because I have so many favorites dishes in all menu. I‚Äôve been coming to this location for years and it never fails to impress. Nick was our server and he offered a flawless experience with food & beverage recommendations, spiels and overall top quality service. I was sad that the oxtail risotto was 86‚Äôd but the Yucca Gnocchi, Churasco and Branzino made up for it! I did wish the branzino was butterflied but it still hit! Looking forward to return and order more favorites! Keep up the great job!
Food was good, drinks where better. The music and the vibe is great. Music isn‚Äôt too loud and the selection of music is really great!! Great spot in Washington heights!

I had a great experience at Terra Vita! I ordered the salmon, and it was absolutely delicious. Perfectly cooked and flavorful. My husband ordered rice but, due to an oyster allergy, requested it without sauce. The rice ended up a bit dry, but our server, Nick, went above and beyond by bringing us four different, delicious sauces to make up for it. I also tried the hibiscus margarita, and it was fantastic. Refreshing with just the right balance of sweetness and tartness. Excellent service and great food. We‚Äôll definitely be back!

Went for Mother's Day under a reservation during Dinner. I recommend a reservation on special days or if you are going with a big group. The experience feels like fine dining because portions are small and pricey. However, despite the price and size every dish that arrived tasted fresh, was well-prepared, and nicely plated. The drinks were also delicious and one came with a fire presentation. I recommend coming here for a special occasion or a date.
Superb food. My last meal before going back to India.. and it was so so so delicious. Lovely oyesters, wine and shrimp wrap. Flavourful.
Dinner at Terravita was delicious, I ordered the Churrasco and the steak was cooked perfectly.  The Staff were friendly and very knowledgeable, the seating was comfy and I loved the modern design.

I‚Äôve been to this place about 8 to 10 times, and it truly never disappoints. The service is immaculate, the food quality is out of this world, and the service is top-notch.

Great job guys

My husband and I have been enjoying this place since they opened.  Owners are present and heavily involved so everything runs smoothly.  One owner is often around clearing tables and taking orders.  Food has never disappointed and always great quality, fresh and tastes amazing!  Our Valentines dinner last night was AMAZING!  All the seafood was phenomenal, apps were awesome and the mussels were hearty ones, no disappointing tiny ones.  Those and the short rib croquettes need to be on the regular menu.  And we had all three desserts because we have had them before and couldn‚Äôt make up our minds.  The place never disappoints.
Perfect brunch - very nice service, excellent food and friendly owner who is going out of his way to make us comfortable and provide the best experience ever.

I've been wanting to visit this restaurant for a while.   There were two doors, one which I attempted to open but was locked and I thought the restaurant was closed because of the storm we were having, but thankfully after 5 minutes, I opened the right door and was greeted by Mr. Christopher.  He was the waiter and very pleasant and helpful.  After I placed my orders, I asked where the washroom/lavatory was, and I am pleased to announce that the washroom was clean, smelled lovely, spacious, had tissue, and soap.  I ordered the tuna tartare and the cauliflower and had a lychee martini.  Compliements to the chef(s)!  The only thing was the tuna tatare was a wee-bit too salty, but for MY taste.  The martini was on point-Ms. Paola was the bartender, and I was very much pleased with her drinks--so much so that I ordered another drink: the Hisbiscus Margarita.  Kaylee, who brought my appetizer, was so sweet!  I had, for an entr√©e, steak frites with truffle fries and salad.  Since I had eaten up all my appetizers, I was only able to eat my truffle fries (yum) and dessert.  I took the steak frites and mesclun salad home.  Speaking of dessert, I had the Coconut Panna Cotta.  It was very nice; there was Suger Smacks or Golden Crisp (or it's generic equivalent) cereal on the top, which took me way back to my young days, but I liked it very much.

All in all, the restaurant was just simply perfect!  Not only perfect, but clean, bright, airy. The music was at a comfortable tone, and the tunes were nice.  As I sat at my table, I could see passersby out the window look with wonderment as to what Terravita was.  As I was finishing, more customers started to come in.  Terravita, literally, is a breath of fresh, clean air in the neighbourhood.  Thanks, Terravita and Christopher, Paola, and Kaylee.  I'll be back, but with a bigger crowd! üíØüíØüíØüíØüíØ‚úåüèΩ‚úåüèΩ‚úåüèΩ‚úåüèΩJob very well done!
Had the pleasure of having brunch here yesterday. The food was top tier and the service incredible. Thank you guys. I will be back!

Magical
This place was all 10‚Äôs across the board. Their slow braised short rib was absolutely amazing! Tender, juicy and flavorful! It was my favorite of the evening. The bread pudding was equally as good and i cant wait to go back and have both!

Ambience, Food, Service? Everything was a 10! Also love the music selection, upbeat classical stuff. The place is just a vibe! Highly recommend this place for an intimate celebration or night out

This place was amazing!!! You could tell the ingredients were fresh. Probably the best burrata I‚Äôve had. The unique textures and mixes make the experience even better. Everything is well served and presented. For dessert I would recommend the chocolate tree (for fun) and the pudin (so so so so so good I could not stop talking about it). If you are in NY, you should def visit.

This is a beautiful restaurant and I had such a nice dining experience. I came for an intimate birthday dinner with just my partner and myself. The service and the food were both exceptional.

I loved the Lobster Bisque entree. It was well worth the price for the quality and the portion size was just right. It was creamy and delicious! My partner ordered the salmon with veggies which was also very good.

The service was great throughout our dinner. Our waiter was friendly and attentive. We felt welcomed.

I would love to visit again to try more menu items as well as the specialty drinks. The hibiscus margarita was refreshing.

I can‚Äôt rave about Terravita enough! I‚Äôve gone several times and never once was I disappointed with the food, the service or ambience. 10/10!!! I took my Mother and Aunt for dinner there a few weeks ago. They enjoyed themselves immensely. To top it off,  we had the pleasure of having Nick, a waiter, attend to my family and I. Nick‚Äôs friendliness, attentiveness and expertise on the menu highlighted our experience even more.  I appreciate the entire staff for always being welcoming and amicable. I‚Äôm definitely looking forward to going back!

Let me start saying the ambiance is amazing I felt like a lounge, this Is amazing place, food we started with the ceviche, to die for. tuna tartar. the shuffle fries, As for the drink my wife is a sevinion blanc, she did not enjoyed it. my mocktale great. As we are eating one of the HEAD OF CHEF came to the table to ask how is the food. I was so pleased and gratified for caring this amongst everything else superv. have to try the Hibiscus Margarita. Now I asked for a medium well stake. it cane well done. Now. from the waiter to the host apologized and that went a long way. My wife  and i loved the music, dessert a pudding the pan with ice scream and 2 champagne drinks, what a amazing experience. I must say you have to try it.

The server was attentive, made great drink recommendations, the appetizer had a great balance of flavor, the entree's where Amazing, and the desserts where a perfect finishing touch in both presentation and taste.

Thank you for a great experience for my Wife and I!!

The environment and staff are extremely welcoming and attentive. We never had to ask for water or repeat any prior requests. It was great to see the owners working with their staff and assisting.

The food was amazing! I ordered the green chicken panini which was delicious. The chocolate tree blew my mind excellent presentation! My family enjoyed it all can't wait to return for another amazing dining experience
First time visiting Terravita and I had an amazing time here. The food and service were great as well as the atmosphere. The drinks were nice as well. Will be coming back soon.
Such a nice spot but the female bartender seems to have her life. She‚Äôs unwelcoming, rude, and makes people feel really uncomfortable. Never again.
Great atmosphere inside, staff was attentive and food as well as the drinks were great.  Such a good time had with my loved ones.

After witnessing a concert at the United Palace, we headed to Terravita based on a recommendation. There were five of us, but two had already eaten and simply accompanied us, which means only three of us dined. For starters, we ordered the mushroom hummus and truffle and cheese fries. As our main courses, we went for the steak and fries and the duck fried rice. We also ordered a hazy IPA and a Tempranillo wine.

The interior of the place is quite lovely, giving off that fine dining vibe.

When our appetizers arrived, they brought us the hummus we had ordered, along with another one with lamb that we didn‚Äôt request. Furthermore, they brought the fries we ordered, along with tacos we didn‚Äôt ask for. We had to call the waiter twice to explain what had happened. So far, so good. My beer arrived; I had ordered a hazy IPA, but they brought me a lager‚Ä¶ not even close. Once again, we had to call the waiter to fix the issue. The hummus was delicious, that‚Äôs the truth, but it was annoying that they brought us things we didn‚Äôt order. When the hanger steak came, it came with another plate of tacos we didn‚Äôt request, and that was like, ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs wrong with the waiter, did he get everything wrong? Was he not listening, or did he want to give us more food for some reason? I don‚Äôt know, and we‚Äôll never know.‚Äù We asked for the bill after the duck rice and left, laughing a bit and a bit irritated. Oh, the final check included drinks we never ordered, so once again, we had to call the waiter to explain and fix the inconvenience.

All of this is to say that we quite enjoyed the food and drinks, but the service was rather clumsy, careless, and unfocused. Besides that, they didn‚Äôt treat us poorly; in fact, everyone was very friendly. It‚Äôs just that we had a waiter who seemed to be on the moon rather than at Terravita. Would I go back? Yes, but I‚Äôd choose a different spot üòÇ.
